alert.note: Alert for Okeechobee (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 13 at 3:59PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Okeechobee County through 430 PM EDT... At 359 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles north of Four Seasons Estates, or 9 miles north of Okeechobee, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Treasure Island, Okeechobee, Four Seasons Estates, Taylor Creek and Country Hills Estates. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
